snippet: The scheduled opening of the Kids’ Powerhouse Discovery Center in 2016 will create a permanent home for what has been a mobile collection of exhibits and activities since 2011.
abstract: Bronx Children's Museum, which currently takes its exhibits on the road in a purple school bus, will open a permanent home near Yankee Stadium in 2016; called the Kids' Powerhouse Discovery Center, 12,800-square foot space will be used to supplement and expand upon the bus's exhibits.
lead_paragraph: The scheduled opening of the Kids’ Powerhouse Discovery Center in 2016 will create a permanent home for what has been a mobile collection of exhibits and activities since 2011.

headline.main: Adrift for Years, Bronx Children’s Museum Finds a Place to Park Its Purple Bus
headline.print_headline: Adrift for Years, a Children’s Museum Finds a Place to Park Its Purple Bus
